oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil War memoir of C. S. O. Rice
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 53-page memoir of Charles Stephens Olin Rice, 2nd Lt., Co. M, 7th Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA. Rice was captured at Vicksburg. He discusses, among other things, the formation of the "Lauderdale Hornets," a local Confederate unit. Also discusses African Americans who served with Confederate units in combat and paternalistic race relations in the antebellum South.
